data.title: Wells Fargo Center
meta_keywords: box office tickets discounts information returns customer
data.meta_description: Located on the Broad Street side of the building. Patrons may park in the C parking lot while visiting the Box Office.
data.text:
Regular Box Office Hours:

The Box Office is currently only open on event days and opens 3 hours prior to an event.

Lobby hours are subject to change due to an event, on sale, holiday, or other unexpected conditions.

The Wells Fargo Center Box Office is located on the North side of the building, next to the VIP Entrance.

If there is an event taking place in the venue when customers come to purchase tickets, customers will have to pay the parking fee to enter the Wells Fargo Center parking lots (even if just buying tickets and not staying) but will be reimbursed the full amount when they exit the parking lot after purchasing tickets, within the allotted time.

Patrons who have tickets being held at Will Call may pick up their tickets on the day of the event. The Will Call is located at the Box Office on the North side of the building, next to the VIP Entrance. We are unable to accept Will Call drop off from patrons.

Patrons must present the actual credit card used to place the order, a valid photo ID and a purchase confirmation number.

For special occasions, check out our Premium Seating options to learn more about Club Box seats and Suites for Wells Fargo Center events.

If you are organizing a school trip, church outing, or other event with a group, we recommend you contact our Group Sales department for potential savings offers.
